```{python}
import pandas as pd
```


```{python}
data = pd.read_csv("data/ensanut2022_socdem(1).csv", sep=";")
```


```{python}
columnas = ['FOLIO_INT', 'h0302', 'h0303', 'h0402', 'entidad1', 'desc_ent1', 'municipio1', 'desc_mun1', 'ponde_f', 'estrato']
```


```{python}
data_limpio = data[columnas].copy()
```


```{python}
data_limpio.to_csv("data/ensanut2022_socdem_limpio.csv", index=False)
```
